data.author: husarafal
data.message:
Fix refactor (#10)

* gz_components.launch default component names

* ...transmitter_link -> ...wibotic_transmitter_link

* remove default component names from ouster and rplidar urdfs

* oak: remove default component name

* fix test errors

* velodyne: remove default component name

* remove oak default name from luxonis_depthai gz bridge launch

* revert oak default name removal

* allow teltonika without name, producing "gps" frame without any prefix

* remove unused imports

* fix teltonika urdf gazebo params

* fix teltonika

data.author: husarafal
data.message:
Big clean up +  frame standarization (#9)

* readme: add disclaimer that manipulators are only supported in sim

* readme: add DEVs to sensor table

* code style: align sensor table rows

* fix teltonika URDF crash

* rename unused "name" param in kinova to avoid confusion with component names

* urdf: rename namespace arg to robot_namespace

* remove all existing occurences of "component_name"; component_name -> component_model_name

* components.urdf: remove default component names

* device_namespace -> component_name

* readme: update xacro params list

* component-specific urdfs: remove default component names

* main urdf: ns -> robot_namespace_value

* macros: rename prefixes:
ns -> robot_namespace_slash
prefix -> component_name_underscore
device_ns -> component_name_slash

* macros: replace the uses of ${robot_namespace}/ and ${component_name}_ or with / at the end

* kinova: add robot_namespace_slash gz_frame_id prefix

* macros: add default component names

* REVIEWME: standarize frame names

* device_namespace_prefix -> component_name_gz_prefix

* remove ros2_control bug workaround
https://github.com/ros-controls/ros2_control/issues/1506

* replace leftover device_namespace -> component_name

* main urdf: remove robot_namespace_value

* kinova urdf: remove robot_name

* urdfs: set default d435 and astra names to "camera"

* Remove extra robotiq_ in name

* urdf default name teltonika -> gps

* revert ouster/velodyne/rplidar/zed reading frame changes

* standarize astra and zed gz sensor names

* fix unit tests

* remove unused imports

* rename teltonika frame
